metadata.description: Cry Yourself to Sleep explores the disappointments of early adulthood by following the lives of three unique characters: Jim, a minimum wage rabbit struggling to pay his rent; Andy, an aspiring novelist dealing with rejection; and The Robot, a machine who just wants to be a better man. In this stellar debut graphic novel, Jeremy Tinder mixes sadness, sweetness, and humor to tell a quirky little story of pride swallowing, fake moustaches, car crashes, and friendship.
metadata.name: Cry Yourself to Sleep
